overview.en: Tesra Supernet is designed to provide a scalable, secure and accessible distributed computing resource service platform that runs on blockchain. By building distribued GPU computing network based on blockchain, combined with the blockchain real-power mechanism and GPU distributed computing architecture, the idle and distributed GPU computing can be integrated to form virtual supercomputers, providing computational services for high-intensity AI training to build AI super brain.
overview.zh: Tesra超算网络旨在提供一个在区块链上运行所需的可扩展、安全和易访问的分布式计算资源服务平台。通过构建一个基于区块链的分布式GPU计算网络，结合区块链的确权机制和GPU分布式运算架构，将闲置且分散于世界各地的GPU算力整合起来形成虚拟超级计算机，为高强度的人工智能训练提供计算服务，构建人工智能超级大脑。
